scripts.dev: npx concurrently --raw "npx lerna run --scope=ssr-mf-about dev" "npx lerna run --scope=ssr-mf-home dev"
scripts.build: FORCE_COLOR=1 lerna run --scope=ssr-mf-about build && FORCE_COLOR=1 lerna run --scope=ssr-mf-home build
scripts.start: npx concurrently --raw "npx lerna run --scope=ssr-mf-about start" "npx lerna run --scope=ssr-mf-home start"
